page.title: 06Population
page.content: The adult popultion of the LINDEAN area numbers 94 of whom all but 14 live in one-third of the block:the 2km by 2km square adjoining the trunk road.Some idea of the community may be deduced from the following statistics:-Men and women in full-time employment 80.Retired people 14.Men 45.Women 49.Natives (born in S.E. Scotland) 55.Non natives 39.In addition,there are 19 children under the age of 16,of whom 5 are under 5 and 12 full time students or apprentices.All available evidence suggests that ,contrary to the experience of many rural communities in other parts of the region,the adult population is higher now than at any previous time.Conversely the child population is probably the smallest ever.
